name: five-day-bible-reading-app
description: Web application to lookup today's reading with the Five-Day Bible Reading plan (fivedaybiblereading.com)

scripts.version: sed -e 's/^.*APP_VERSION.*=.*;/const APP_VERSION = "'$npm_package_version'";/' ./service-worker.js > ./temp.js && mv temp.js service-worker.js && git add ./service-worker.js
